item.title: Dionysios Gavounelis
item.description:
Dionysios Gavounelis

Dionysis Gavounelis is a dispute resolution partner, and heads the firm’s procurement & construction team, specialising in complex litigation, and the full spectrum of procurement, through tendering, contracting, execution and the resolution of disputes.

item.title: Sovereign Finance
item.description:
Sovereign Finance

We are at the forefront of the law and practice related to the sovereign debt crisis. Partners at KP have established  track records advising managers of general syndicated and special sovereign issues, as well as  large portfolio managers on secondary market transactions.

item.title: Privatization
item.description:
Privatization

Partners at KP have had leading roles in some of the most significant privatizations of the previous 1990s and 2000s privatizations waves. We have seen through the partial privatization of electricity, telecoms and other industries, from inception to implementation, to post transaction conduct of disputes and settlement of claims, acting principally for financial advisers, but occasionally also for the HR.

item.title: Media & Entertainment
item.description:
Media & Entertainment

In an increasingly complex regulatory environment governing distribution models and technologies, across multiple platforms and international borders, it makes a difference to engage a well-resourced team that pieces together the high theory and hands-on practice of media, media transactions and related disputes, equipped with strong insights in intellectual property, antitrust and competition law, and groomed to work up from solid finance and disputes foundations.

item.title: Infrastructure
item.description:
Infrastructure

At KP we have advised and represented engineering and construction firms and JVs in major road, railway and subway projects and have successfully conducted large value, multi-party and cross-border disputes arising from complex EPC hot and cold industrial, electromechanical and civil works in transportation and heavy industry projects.

item.title: Healthcare & Life Sciences
item.description:
Healthcare & Life Sciences

We regularly act for manufacturers, distributors and service providers of medical equipment, single use medical devices, prescription and non-prescription medicines and pharmaceutical substances in regulatory, compliance,  transactional and contentious matters.

item.title: Financial Services
item.description:
Financial Services

The partners at KP have established track records acting for most types of credit and financial institutions; we have acted for many of the larger global and international investment banks, securities houses, investment, hedge and private equity funds, trustees, custodians and underwriters, insurers and reinsurers, and their directors and officers.

item.title: Distribution & supply networks
item.description:
Distribution & supply networks

We are particularly well versed in transactional and contentious matters arising out of distribution networks. We benefit from our capabilities in competition & antitrust, disputes and commercial law, to provide a state-of-the art advisory and transactional service, while our disputes partners have successfully acted for manufacturers, franchisors, warehousing and logistics operators, financiers and insurers of cross border trade.

item.title: Crisis Management
item.description:
Crisis Management

We recognize the critical role of zero-fault crisis management in many disaster, accident, fraud and similar adversities. Experience shows that in many crisis scenarios the management, the general or lead counsel, or the strategy and communications professional, frequently have one shot at making the right decisions. We are fit for the task of bringing instant key input to decision makers, assuring compliance, minimizing goodwill damage and preventing tactical exploitation by competitors.

item.title: Restructuring & Insolvency
item.description:
Restructuring & Insolvency

We are at the forefront of international restructuring, distressed investment and insolvency law and finance across sectors and industries. We work programmatically to incorporate the latest global ideas and developments in the laws and finance of insolvency, such as the use of arbitrage opportunities in the bond and secondary distressed debt, and the primary corporate finance markets, for consensual and non-consensual restructuring, into the substantive and procedural arsenal we bring to the service of investors, creditors and turnaround advisers.
